product_name: The North Face Denali Jacket - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Denali Jacket for boys keeps active kids warm and stylish for serious outdoor play. Exceptionally warm, heavyweight Polartec(R) Classic 300 fleece contains at least 50% recycled content and sports a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed water. Abrasion-resistant nylon overlays on elbows and upper body increase durability and water resistance. Features zippered, tricot-lined handwarmer pockets, non-binding nylon/Lycra(R) spandex cuffs and elastic-bound hem. The North Face Denali jacket collar flips up for added neck protection; write-on ID label helps prevent loss. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Denali Jacket for boys keeps active kids warm and stylish for serious outdoor play.
